channel.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
channel.description:
Recently tried out making a private server, and I decided to use Project16 V.6. It seemed quite simple.. so if anyone's used this and I need to do something special please tell me c:
I used the 'compile.bat' and 'runserver.bat' and they both worked fine. (When I hit runserver.bat it shows "---Project 16 V.6 by Wolf :-Enabled-:---" ... so I'm not sure if that means it worked xD). But if I try using the MoparScape client it won't connect. So obviously I'm doing something wrong.. I have Hamachi and No-IP registered and everything T_T
While port forwarding, in several tutorials, as well as the PortForward.com guide, it tells me to use the Default Gateway from my IP config, which ends in '.1' .. but when I add the '.1', it tells me that I can't. BUT, it DOES work when I put '.2' at the end.. just wondering if anyone can figure out what the problem is? D:
Here's a screenie :3 [img]http://i.imgur.com/kvn5V.png[/img]
Aaand sorry for my English.

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @Pyrites Pyrites
item.description:
@Pyrites wrote:

Alright, thanks! I’ll download it and PM you the details. You’re very helpful c:

EDIT:
Alright, I’ve installed it and you got the ‘ID’ and password details. Are you supposed to give me something, do I have to be online, or can you just do it whenever? I’m the biggest nub, please excuse that

Read full topic

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Don’t disable your firewall. That won’t help. Download teamviewer if you don’t already have it and PM me your details. I’ll fix your problem for you.

Read full topic

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @Pyrites Pyrites
item.description:
@Pyrites wrote:

The Firewall is disabled.

Now I know for sure that my port is closed, but I have no idea… I followed everything. I’ve made my IP static, and then entered the IPv4 Address into the router’s configuration, and used Port 43954, but still the port isn’t open. Anyone have any thoughts? ;-;

Read full topic
item.source: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Pyrites, post:5, topic:412796”]From that website I got this:

Error: I could not see your service on 173.238.129.230 on port (43594) Reason: Connection timed out :((
Should I change the port, or what…? It seems I’ve followed everything correctly for port forwarding, too.

And yes there is a client.class file and a client.java file, but when I click on the .class file it says “Could not find or load main class file.” Same with all of the other .classes.[/quote]
Disable the firewall for that port on your computer if you haven’t done so

Read full topic

item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

Is there a client to the server you have??? If so then the server will only run to the Client or something like that… Also to check if the Portfoward is worked

Click here

EDIT:

I was going to give you RL’s one but that’s another RSPS Community and that’s against the rules

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @Pyrites Pyrites
item.description:
@Pyrites wrote:

So I changed that part that wouldn’t let me, to my IPv4 Address…

Thanks a lot! I’ll report back here if it works.

EDIT:
Well I changed what you said, now I’m lost. After I changed it, I compiled and then ran it… but it doesn’t show any evidence that it worked.
I tried logging in with the MoparScape client but it didn’t work again. Am I supposed to specify somewhere in the base files what the IP or port is? Anything specific to do with Project16 V.6’s files? (Or should I use a different base, if it matter?..) Please help…

Read full topic
item.source: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed

item.title: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

To find out what Port it is to open VIA THE IP, go on the CMD and type IPconfig as you would before. The IP you need to use is the IPv4 Address

That’s the IP needed to portfoward

EDIT:

The default gateway is your Address to login to your router

AND DON’T USE HAMATCHI, IT’S ABSOLUTLY USELESS AND IT MUCKS UP COMPLETLY… Once you have port fowarded you don’t need hamatci

Read full topic
item.source: CONFIGURING PORT HELP PL0X? D: Really needed
